column4: I'm trying to connect to my home network from www.gnome.org.  When I set the router to forward port 22 to my fedora computer, I get in.  When I set it to forward to my ubuntu computer, the connection times out.
I'm think this is _not_ an ssh problem for a routing/firewall problem after seeing the logs.  I'm going to eat and try another approach.
are you able to ping the ubuntu server ?
